book.synopsis: Introduction by Ellen S. Shapiro. Anne of Green Gables is off to college! Young adults will enjoy this delightful collection, which features the novel Anne of the Islands and two short story collections, Chronicles of Avonlea and Further Chronicles of Avonlea. Black-and-white illustrations.
book.title_long: Anne of the Islands and Tales of Avonlea
